record.attribute:
We are pleased to announce the release of FungiDB 1.0 beta


This release of FungiDB includes 18 species of Fungi in Ascomycete, Basidiomycete, and Zygomycota


The following Fungal Genomese are now available via FungiDB:
  • Eurotiomyctes; Ascomycota
    • Aspergillus clavatus
    • Aspergillus flavus
    • Aspergillus fumigatus
    • Aspergillus niger
    • Aspergillus nidulans (Emericella nidulans)
    • Aspergillus terreus
    • Coccidoidies immitis
    • Sordariomycetes; Ascomyocta
      • Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. lycopersici
      • Gibberella zeae (Fusarium graminearum)
      • Gibberella moniliformis (Fusarium verticillioides)
      • Magnaporthea oryzae formerly (Magnaporthe grisea)
      • Neurospora crassa
    • Saccharomycotina; Ascomyocta
      • Candida albicans
      • Saccharomyces cerevisiae
    • Basidiomycota
      • Filobasidiella neoformans (Cryptococcus neoformans var grubii)
      • Puccinia graminis
    • Mucormycotina ("Zygomycota")
      • Rhizopus oryzae
